TopicTitle: How to properly use Rapier Engines in SSTO (explained)

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone

Here's a video I made recently explaining how Rapier Engines should be used in SSTO construction and why it's a lot more effective to use these in regular air breathing mode and avoid the Alt mode
Thanks for sharing, AnTREXon. This is more of a tutorial, so I took the liberty of moving it to our Tutorials section where people will have an easier time finding it.
